name: iMorph 2.0
description:
Background:

  • Play as a robot capable of duplicating itself into other things.

Controls:

  • x = Hold down x and move in a direction to duplicate.
  • q = Reset
  • Use duplicated objects to make your way through these levels.

Misc:

  • This project is extremely short.
  • Had to scrap A LOT of things and development had its frustrating moments. I'm just glad I was able to finish something!
